item.title: Author
item.description: 6W3N is one of the anagram of mwmin that is the nickname of Wataru Mukaimine. I’m mainly studying evolutionary ecology. Career: 2011 Hakuyo High School, Kanagawa Pref., Japan 2014 Undergraduate of Biological Science, Univ. of Tsukuba, Ibaraki Pref., Japan 2018 Master’s program of Biological Science, Univ.

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you have a question or suggestion, send me e-mail. email1: mw.bioeco[at]gmail.com email2: mukaimine[at]pe.ska.life.tsukuba.ac.jp

item.title: Links
item.description: Those which related to me PE LAB.: Affiliate lab. TEES (Tsukuba Evolutionary Ecology Seminar): I’m managing. Those who take care of me Dr. Yukihiko TOQUENAGA Dr. Ikuyo SAEKI Mr. Takayuki YAMAMOTO Dr. Ryuichiro MACHIDA Dr. Kazutaka KAWATSU

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Happy Birthday Chords
item.description: Happy ABirthday Eto youHappy EBirthday Ato youHappy A7Birthday dear DJohnnyHappy ABirthday Eto Ayou
